Name: Island Explorer VR
About the game: BE WARNED: Driving mechanics of this game is NOT recommended for the beginners. It is recommended that players have experience with complex/compound controls in VR and some driving experience. Island Explorer is a short VR driving experience where you are on a secluded island with nothing to disturb you: no quests, no tasks, and no enemies. Just you, your thoughts, and natureâ€¦ with some relaxing tunes. Interactive utility vehicle H-Shifter, introducing the first ever VR Manual shifting Enjoy the scenery Drive into the sunset
